name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Congress is questioning Twitter about allowing extremists on their site. In response, Twitter said, “We have to, he’s the president.”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Today is Martin Luther King Jr. Day. Just to break it down for you young people, a long time ago there used to be something called “racism.”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Saudi Arabia has lifted a 35-year ban on movie theaters, and the first movie to screen publicly was “The Emoji Movie.” So the ban is back on.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: North Korea and South Korea are considering having a joint women’s ice hockey team for the Olympics. Of course, when a North Korean player enters the penalty box, they’re never seen again.
